reason: A physical fight is described, indicating a potential for injury. While the observer wasn't directly involved, the intensity of the fight ("really going at it") and the observer's fear suggest a tangible risk of violence.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Scary night. Found my roommate barely breathing. Narcan saved their life. Please, if you're using, keep it on hand. Learn how to use it. Could save someone you love. ❤️
reason: Roommate experienced a life-threatening overdose requiring Narcan intervention, indicating a severe immediate risk.

title: User Story: Abuse
content: It's so hard to admit, but things at home haven't been good. Constant put-downs, isolating me from friends... feels like I'm walking on eggshells. Anyone else been through this? Feeling so alone.
reason: The text describes emotional abuse and social isolation, indicating a potentially harmful situation. The user is feeling alone and walking on eggshells, suggesting a stressful and potentially controlling environment.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw my friend OD last night. Scariest thing ever. Narcan saved them, but I'm still shaken. Please, if you're using, have someone with you and carry Narcan. It could save a life.
reason: The text describes a recent overdose event requiring Narcan intervention, indicating a high risk situation that nearly resulted in death.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Saw someone OD downtown yesterday. Scariest thing ever. Narcan saved them, but it shook me up. Learn CPR and carry Narcan if you can. It could save a life. #addiction #overdose #narcan
